project.title: project description
project.text: Parameters that define the project as a whole.

project_defaults.title: project defaults
project_defaults.text: A set of parameters that are the same for all datasets in all analyses.

analysis.title: project datasets
analysis.text: Descriptions of each dataset to include in the analysis stages.

people.title: project people
people.text: The lab and scientist involved in the project.

project_ids.title: project IDs
project_ids.text: Identifiers that can be used for the project.

project_type.title: project type
project_type.text: A curated identifier for the project type which should be the same as used by ASF. This is included in the project design file in the data directory or in the LIMS.

genomes.title: genomes in the project
genomes.text: A list of genomes used in the project, a dataset is linked to one of the genomes by the genome key of a dataset.

fastq_paths.title: paths to FastQ files
fastq_paths.text: A list of paths that can be searched that may have a FastQ (*.fastq.gz file for one or more of the datasets.

feature_types.title: assay types
feature_types.text: A list of LIMS IDs for each curated type of data. The feature_types keys depend on the data type and application. For example, Cell Ranger ARC expects Gene Expression and Chromatin Accessibility feature types.

feature_identifiers.title: identifiers
feature_identifiers.text: Which feature identifier should be used as the default: probably name or accession.

stages.title: analysis stages
stages.text: A list of workflows that should be applied to a dataset. In this example, these two workflows will be applied to all four datasets in the analysis.

index.title: genome index
index.text: The index against which the dataset(s) were quantified. This can be used by modules to get paths to GTF, FastA and FastA index files, for example.

genome.title: genome
genome.text: The key that was used in genomes to identify a set of genome parameters. Multiple genomes can be used in the same project, but are likely best separated into different analyses.

dataset.title: a dataset
dataset.text: The first (of four) datasets. Each dataset is specified in a separate stanza of _datasets.

description.title: description
description.text: A short description of this sample.

limsid.title: LIMS ID
limsid.text: The name(s) of libraries used to describe the dataset. In snRNA+ATAC for example, this would be a collection of two libraries: one for the RNA-seq and another for the ATAC-seq.

dataset_tag.title: dataset tag
dataset_tag.text: A short tag to describe a dataset that can be appended to cell barcodes to quickly discriminate originating dataset and uniquely identify cells in (Seurat) integrated objects.
